fields.summary: Version code of app is not recognised in google play. When I try uploading my apk unto play store it fails stating that there is already an app with version code 1 even though I have compiled the new app with a different version(2.0).

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
Would be nice to expose the <manifest android:versionCode="" android:versionName=""> values to the user inside the App-Editor view when you open the tiapp.xml. 
It's always an error source if users trying to create an update for their app and upload it. You have to know that you have to edit the xml file and increase the versionCode
fields.summary: Android: Expose versionCode and versionName in TiApp Editor View
